author: hangleang.eth
content:
> Peers that are unable to reply to data column sidecar requests within the range data_column_serve_range **SHOULD respond with error code 3: ResourceUnavailable**. Such peers that are unable to successfully reply to this range of requests MAY get descored or disconnected at any time.

I wonder how other clients team handle this case? grandine respond empty in this case

author: barnabasbusa
content: as empty could mean that there was no data columns

author: hangleang.eth
content: that's make sense, so I have to handle this kind of case with this rpc error, and handle the response with the status code, instead of downscore and disconnect
